text: Schnaus was a municipality of the district of Surselva in the canton of Graubünden, Switzerland. On 1 January 2014, the former municipalities of Schnaus, Castrisch, Ilanz, Ladir, Luven, Pitasch, Riein, Ruschein, Sevgein, Duvin, Pigniu, Rueun and Siat merged into the new municipality of Ilanz/Glion. ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Graubünden
title: Schnaus
